whoWeAre.title: Turi Bande
whoWeAre.description: Turi itsinda ry’abarimu n’abatekinisiye bafite umuhate wo guhindura uko abana biga binyuze mu mbuga za mudasobwa ziteguye neza kandi zishishikaje.

mission.title: Inshingano
mission.description: Gutoza buri mwana kwigirira icyizere, kugira udushya no kugira amatsiko binyuze mu kumuha ibikoresho, ubumenyi no kumutera imbaraga zo gukurikirana inzozi ze afite intego.

vision.title: Icyerekezo
vision.description: Ahazaza aho buri mwana akurira yumva ko abonwa, ashyigikiwe kandi yishimye ku bwo uwo ari kugenda abaho, ababyeyi be nabo bari kumwe nawe muri urwo rugendo.
